channel.title: [Cleaned PI] Glitched Lunars | Dc's You
channel.description: I'm using a cleaned out PI for a base. It has lunars & a lunar altar, but when I try to switch to lunars (via altar or command) it completely dc's you, and when you log back in, if you click on your magic book, you get dc'd... does anyone know a fix or can anybody send me a link on how to fix this? It would be greatly appreciated, as I've already done a lot on this server so far :)

item.title: [Cleaned PI] Glitched Lunars | Dc's You
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

Take a look at your lunar spellbook code and try to find any error in it. You can compare it with a working lunar system to check it.

Read full topic

item.title: [Cleaned PI] Glitched Lunars | Dc's You
item.dc:creator: @Brandon_Codes Brandon Codes
item.description:
@Brandon_Codes wrote:

I’m using a cleaned out PI for a base. It has lunars & a lunar altar, but when I try to switch to lunars (via altar or command) it completely dc’s you, and when you log back in, if you click on your magic book, you get dc’d… does anyone know a fix or can anybody send me a link on how to fix this? It would be greatly appreciated, as I’ve already done a lot on this server so far
